医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
慢性压力会恢复大脑，钝声感知重复的压力会破坏听觉处理，使声音随着时间的流逝显得安静，如一项对小鼠的新研究所示。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250217/chronic-stress-rewires-the-brain-dulling-sound-ception.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250217/chronic-stress-rewires-the-brain-dulling-sound-poception.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=878e1a7f-6abd-44a1-b86a-d4e32f9942f6 Mon, 17 Feb 2025 15:09:00 -0500 Chronic stress rewires the brain, dulling sound perception
MHIN亚洲枢纽揭幕了以应对亚洲的心理健康挑战在精神卫生保健方面的重大进步中，Singhealth Duke-Nus全球卫生研究所与心理健康创新网络（MHIN）合作，今天宣布了MHIN ASIA HUB。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250217/mhin-asia-hub-unveield-to-address-mental-mental-health-health-challenges-in-asia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250217/mhin-asia-hub-unveiled-to-address-anddress-mental-mental-health-health-challenges-in-asia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5324B24A-0399-43EF-B3E2-684428B3D629 Mon, 17 Feb 2025 14:29:52 -0500 MHIN Asia Hub unveiled to address mental health challenges in Asia
研究表明，空气清新剂和清洁产品的看不见危险当您穿过松树林时，清脆的新鲜气味是您注意到的第一件事。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250217/research-shows-shows-the--unseen-danger-fresheners-and-fresheners-and-cleaning-products.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250217/research-shows-the-the--unseen-danger-fresheners-and-fresheners-and-cleaning-products.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d8c1dbb5-ef46-44e1-bdc4-911aefda9a91 Mon, 17 Feb 2025 14:22:42 -0500 Research shows the unseen danger of air fresheners and cleaning products
长期健康状况风险较高的ARFID儿童回避限制性食物摄入障碍（ARFID）患有精神病和身体状况的风险较高，Karolinska Institutet发表在JAMA儿科报告中的一项新研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250217/children-with-with-arfid-at--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250217/children-with-with-arfid-at-higher-risk-for-long--term-term-health-shealth-sissues.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=793f07-b8cc-4978-b6c8-264e5d3bb4f9 Mon, 17 Feb 2025 14:04:00 -0500 Children with ARFID at higher risk for long-term health conditions
Chromtr在中期细胞图像中彻底改变了染色体检测Chromtr是中期细胞图像中染色体检测的尖端框架，代表了细胞遗传学领域的显着进步。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250217/chromtr-revolutions-chromosome-detection-in-metaphase-cell-cell-images.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250217/chromtr-revolutions-chromosome-detection-in-metaphase-cell-cell-images.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=49d8d046-ec6a-4e23-a641-3d9bodical Mon, 17 Feb 2025 13:47:00 -0500 ChromTR revolutionizes chromosome detection in metaphase cell images
Uchicago研究人员从Malva Nut开发水凝胶以进行医疗用途芝加哥大学Pritzker大学工程学院（Uchicago GME）和Uchicago Chemistry系的新研究中，用于草药茶中的坚果已成为一种非常适合各种生物医学用途的水凝胶。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250217/uchicago-researchers-develop-hydrogel-hydrogel-from-malva-nut-for-medical-use.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250217/uchicago-researchers-develop-hydrogel-hydrogel-from-malva-nut-nut-for-medical-use.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8E010E97-8B3D-43F8-A8FF-DCF361F8CC83 Mon, 17 Feb 2025 13:44:22 -0500 UChicago researchers develop hydrogel from malva nut for medical use
研究表明，体育博彩和赌博成瘾的帮助寻求帮助一项新的研究，在JAMA内科发表，由加州大学圣地亚哥大学高通大学和医学院的研究人员领导，揭示了自Landmark Murphy诉NCAA Supreme Court Disagies以来，体育博彩和赌博成瘾帮助寻求帮助的急剧增加2018年，各州将体育博彩合法化铺平了道路。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250217/study-reveals-surge-ingge-in-sports-betting-betting-and-gambling-gambling-gambling-addiction-help-seeking.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250217/study-reveals-surge-in-surge-in-sports-betting-and-betting-and-gambling-gambling-addiction-help-seeking.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=A6DBBDE3-55EE-4697-99C6-B82E19F1C446 Mon, 17 Feb 2025 13:37:00 -0500 Study reveals surge in sports betting and gambling addiction help seeking
胰腺癌重编程神经细胞以促进生长胰腺癌是通过与神经系统的连接助长的。这是由德国癌症研究中心（DKFZ）和海德堡干细胞技术与实验医学研究所（HI-STEM）的科学家报道的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250217/pancreatic-cancer-reprograms-nerve-cells-cells-cells-cells-to-fuel-growth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250217/pancreatic-cancer-reprograms-nerve-cells-cells-cells-cells-to-fuel-growth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d345A491-40CA-43B8-9CCE-6520E2994CF7 Mon, 17 Feb 2025 13:23:58 -0500 Pancreatic cancer reprograms nerve cells to fuel growth
AI工具加快了患者筛查的心力衰竭试验根据JAMA发表的一项新研究，由大规模的杨百翰研究人员领导，人工智能（AI）可以迅速筛查患者进行临床试验入学率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250217/ai-tool-speeds-up-patient-screening-for-for-for-for-failure-trials.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250217/ai-tool-speeds-up-patient-screening-for-for-for-for-failure-trials.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4793ABC6-5B64-4850-A52A-CAAAA3E3E4565CE Mon, 17 Feb 2025 13:09:42 -0500 AI tool speeds up patient screening for heart failure trials
开创性的ALS平台试验加速了研究和药物测试肌萎缩性侧索硬化症（ALS）是一种致命的神经退行性疾病，几乎没有治疗选择。自2018年以来，马萨诸塞州总医院（MGH）的Sean M. Healey＆AMG ALS中心（MASCACHUSETTS综合医院（MGH））是Mass General Brigham Healthcare System的创始成员在ALS中，使用共享试验基础架构和安慰剂数据同时测试多种药物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250217/groundbreaking-als-als-als-als-platform-trial-accelerates-research-research-and-drug-testing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250217/groundbreaking-als-als-als-platform-trial-accelerates-research-research-and-drug-testing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f0aad8ae-cd43-4127-b0ef-4E9767D44405F Mon, 17 Feb 2025 13:01:51 -0500 Groundbreaking ALS platform trial accelerates research and drug testing
